content.raw: [Louise Poubel](https://bitbucket.org/chapulina/) Of course, but in the end we will be running on Amazon EC2 machines.  So why not build an EC2 instance with whatever code needs to be there, make an image of that on amazon and make that available to the teams?  Then we create an instance with that image, add our code and we are done.  We can make an image of that and then launch as needed.  Amazon makes this really, really easy to do.
